title: Elementary Science Critical Thinking Instructional Design via Semiotic Approach

context.prior_knowledge: Foundational science knowledge and understanding of educational methodologies
context.additional_context: Symbol system analysis and collaborative learning environment construction using smartphone apps.

learning_goals: Learners can critically analyze the meaning construction of symbolic and semiotic systems when explaining elementary science concepts
Learners can design student-teacher interaction scenarios using PBL while applying symbol-based critical thinking facilitation strategies
Learners enhance multimodal knowledge-building skills through the process of generating, evaluating, and revising scientific models and representations

resources: Smartphone-Based Collaboration Tools (e.g., Google Jamboard, Miro)
Video production app (for simple instructional material development)
constraints.tech_requirements: Limited tech environment (no PC, smartphone only)

difficulty: Moderate - Standard complexity with some constraints
